name: The Life Of Night City
desc: Help Cops with Quota. Take a hit mission for corpo ladies. Experience a more mixed crowd. The City is Lively!
author: RedRockStudio (Eli, Drew, Donk)

changelog.desc:
(Hotfix date 11-10-2022)
 -Fixed Bounty mission not finishing
 -Improved Crowd Activity, The walk paths are guided by your sight now.
 -Implemented the Psycho Attitude.
 So now Everyone can fight EVERYONE.
